Date: Wednesday, 4/9/1989
Subject: Mark Leiter healing process
Mark Leiter is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,

to promote him soon!
